Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.utils.observer.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.player.Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
Lorenzo, RealPlayer
public abstract class Player
extends it.polimi.ingsw.utils.observer.Observable
Player is an abstract class. there can be two types of player: the real player and Lorenzo.
